column3: Regular traffic reports will resume Friday April 12 at 7:00 a.m.
UK Blue-White Game / Nicholasville Rd Traffic Pattern:
column4: On Friday afternoon April 12 between 4 p.m. and 6 p.m., Nicholasville Rd will have two lanes open in each direction.

column3: UK Blue-White Game / Nicholasville Rd Traffic Pattern:
column4: Rush hour traffic pattern will NOT be in effect.  Motorists traveling outbound can expect long delays.
